history.title: My Story
paragraphs: In 2020, I started in the tech industry. I have worked for large companies such as Merlin Properties, Airbus Defence And Space, and Codere NEWCO. I have always held roles as a cross-platform developer specializing in multiplatform applications. I have done it all: hybrid and web applications, setting up servers, automation scripts, backends...

About me: I like computers, music, and fitness. I have always been creative, analytical, and a bit restless. If you want to know more about me, I invite you to visit my blog. I'm sure you'll find interesting articles.

In 2025, I will publish my applications and try to monetize them. In fact, I have a fitness app that is about to be released... What I am sure of is that one day, I will be able to make a living from software without relying on third-party companies.
Freedom is within reach of any programmer, as many before have proven. You just have to take it.

skills.title: My Skills
description: My main expertise is software development, focused on web development and cross-platform applications. I am also fully capable of developing any other type of software if necessary: process automation, backend, CMS...

If you want to learn more about my work, I invite you to visit the projects section of this website. There, you will find all the projects I have completed to date, both professional and personal. There are even links so you can check them out.
